pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modules for net-im/prosody, developed by the Prosody XMPP-server community and developers. May include unstable, outdated or just broken ones. But also may have interested ones.

use.flag: Install misc modules (not in the root of repo, may be broken, outdated and so on)
